timeline.message: Make service exceptions a type of repo exception
Implement history log and service for adding new versions to a versioned datastream
replacing setDescription with update description service
Use last modified timestamp for versions created after the first one added to the log.
Add manager for getting locks on pids

Lock pids for writing before beginning version updating. Not using fedora transaction here since it would not protect binary transfers and there are inconsistencies as to whether or not fedora returns a date created in a transaction

Fixes to fedora content service to require valid datastreams be selected, and to allow access to datastreams other than the original file. Datastreams now record what container they can be found in. Added datastream for mods history
